column4: this channel isn't going to encourage the use of Automatix...
Why is that?  Is there some fault(s) in automatix?  I know very little about it (as in 10minutes worth of knowledge)
supposedly it's getting better, but there have been system-killing faults in that script for a long time - and problems with the former developer...
Thanks, I will have to read up on that on a forum somehwere
